author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Salem District Legal Services Authority celebrated International Women’s Day by conducting a legal awareness camp in Padmavani Arts and Science College for Women here recently.

V. Ravichandran, Sub-Judge and Secretary of the District Legal Services Authority, presided over the programme. S.Alli, District Judge and Presiding Officer, Labour Court, underlined the importance of celebrating woman and womanhood rather than the Woman’s Day.

R. Arulmozhiselvi, Second Additional Sub-Judge, complained that poor people are still hesitating to approach the courts. The District Legal Services Authority is providing free legal assistance to those who cannot afford for the same. The people should take advantage of this.

Balu, Special Judge, and K. Ambika, Judicial Magistrate No. 1, also spoke.
title: Legal awareness camp held
